name: Lost in the Labyrinth (CGI_ERICYT)
description:
• A sprawling maze filled with hidden pathways and secrets to discover(coming soon)
  • Fluid and intuitive character movement that allows for seamless exploration(coming soon)
  • Atmospheric sound design that immerses players in the labyrinth's eerie and haunting environment(coming soon)

Lost in the Labyrinth is an immersive walking simulator that takes players on a journey through a mysterious and sprawling maze. With no clear path or objective, players must use their wits and exploration skills to navigate the maze and uncover its secrets.

Lost in the Labyrinth is an experimental game that invites players to get lost in its twisting corridors and discover the hidden mysteries that lie within. Whether you're a fan of walking simulators or just looking for a unique and atmospheric gaming experience, Lost in the Labyrinth is sure to captivate and intrigue you.

Note: This version of the game currently only features the maze and character movement mechanics. Puzzles and other gameplay mechanics will be added in future updates.

⚠️Warning⚠️: Lost in the Labyrinth was created by an AI language model and may contain bugs or other unexpected behavior. Play at your own risk.
